name: Choo Choo (viri_renard)
description:
Controls : 100% mouse.

Left button : Select your tool on the left panel, and place it on the board.   

  • Rails require clic & drag to create a (somewhat) straight path.
  • Switches can only be placed on empty spaces. The closed path will be on the side closest to your pointer.
  • Trains can only be placed on tracks, and come with a free wagon !
  • Wagons are added to the closest train.
  • Kabooms destroy any lake/forest/montain that stands in your way !
  • With any tool, left clic on a switch will change the open path

Right button : clic to delete some tracks or switches. Stations, trains and wagons can't be destroyed !

You can adjust game speed with the three buttons on the bottom left : pausing is recommended when things get hairy :)


Code : viri & imj

Art : Lilly
